info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Content-Length: 707 Accept-Ranges: bytes Cache-Control: public, max-age=0 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https://api.github.com https://raw.githubusercontent.com https://sentry.incubateur.net *.gouv.fr;frame-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr;img-src 'self' data: https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/ https://raw.githubusercontent.com;script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://stats.data.gouv.fr;base-uri 'self';block-all-mixed-content;font-src 'self' https: data:;form-action 'self';frame-ancestors 'self';object-src 'none';script-src-attr 'none';style-src 'self' https: 'unsafe-inline';upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Wed, 05 Oct 2022 13:56:07 GMT Etag: W/"2c3-183844ebfe8" Expect-Ct: max-age=0 Last-Modified: Wed, 28 Sep 2022 13:34:57 GMT Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: no-referrer Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Request-Id: 351ced50-b6b6-43e6-a41e-322705b52b54 X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Ecobalyse

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found Connection: close Content-Length: 140 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Wed, 05 Oct 2022 13:56:20 GMT Expect-Ct: max-age=0 Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: no-referrer Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Request-Id: 05062e23-1d7b-44fd-8ea4-dbc7ead8f231 Error 
Cannot POST /
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: CNAME Fingerprint
author: pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37461
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CNAME
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37461
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CNAME

;; ANSWER SECTION:
ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	10800	IN	CNAME	wikicarbone.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44419
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 44419
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr.	10800	IN	CNAME	wikicarbone.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.
wikicarbone.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	300	IN	CNAME	sc-lb-pool-01.osc-fr1.scalingo-network.com.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
scalingo-network.com.	3600	IN	SOA	burt.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2277339532 10000 2400 604800 3600
